metadata.title: CVE-2021-47184 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i40e:Fix NULL ptr dereference on VSI filter sync Remove the reason of nullpointer dereference in sync VSI filters. Added new I40E_VSI_RELEASING flagto signalize deleting and releasing of VSI resources to sync this threadwith sync filters subtask. Without this patch it is possible to startupdate the VSI filter list after VSI is removed, that's causing a kerneloops.
